name: PokeBrick
description:
Based on a classic arcade game, PokeBrick is a new version of the breakout game. The purpose of the game is still the same: break all bricks in order to pass to the next level. While trying to finish the game, the player will:

-          Get a series of positive power-ups that will help him get through;

-          Avoid some negative power-ups that increase the difficulty of the game;

-          Discover 36 playable levels, one crazier than another;

-          Play through 6 different themes;

-          Make use of a multiplying factor, that will increase buffs exponentially and will unleash hell among those poor bricks.

-          …and much more
